Humans

  • Humans are unusual in Aidilon as they are the only race able to produce viable mixed-blood offspring. All known half races are half human, half something else (elf, orc, devil, etc.).
  • Humans are also the only member of the five ancient races (Humans, Elves, Dwarves, Gnomes, and Halflings) that cannot trace their ancestry back to a specific region of the continent. Their original homeland is unknown, but some evidence suggests it may have been Wrakarr, many millennia ago.
